name: Seal VS Nutella
description:
//Português

O malvado doutor nutella raptou sua namorada, então você tera que salva-la!

Sim, eu não sou muito criativo

SourceCode: https://www.mediafire.com/file/dl752evcwbcnoqq/Seal_VS_Nutella.yyz/file

Controles:

Movimentação: Setinhas ou WASD

Pular: Z ou ESPAÇO

Deslizar: X ou SHIFT

Atacar: C ou Clique Esquerdo

Creditos

Asset da cidade : https://nyknck.itch.io/citypackpixelart

Sprite da moeda : https://totuslotus.itch.io/pixel-coins

Musica principal : https://freesound.org/people/BloodPixelHero/sounds/582292/

Musica do menu : https://freesound.org/people/X3nus/sounds/449938/

Musica do boss : https://freesound.org/people/B_Sean/sounds/421886/

Efeito de botão colidindo com o mouse : pixabay.com do usuario 666HeroHero

Sprite do cursor : https://www.seekpng.com/ipng/u2e6r5t4q8q8t4y3_piq-mouse-pointer-pixel-art-by-ces...

//English

The evil Nutella Doctor kidnapped your girlfriend, so you have to save her! 

Yeah, I'm not much criative

Controls:

Movement: ARROWS or WASD

Jump: Z or SPACE

Slide: X or SHIFT

Attack: C or left click

Credits:

The asset of the city : https://nyknck.itch.io/citypackpixelart

the coins sprite : https://totuslotus.itch.io/pixel-coins

Main Music : https://freesound.org/people/BloodPixelHero/sounds/582292/

Menu Music : https://freesound.org/people/X3nus/sounds/449938/

Boss Music: https://freesound.org/people/B_Sean/sounds/421886/

Sound Effect that play when your cursor touch the buttons: pixabay.com from the user 666HeroHero

Cursor Sprite : https://www.seekpng.com/ipng/u2e6r5t4q8q8t4y3_piq-mouse-pointer-pixel-art-by-ces...
